text: وَلَوۡ شَآءَ رَبُّكَ لَجَعَلَ ٱلنَّاسَ أُمَّةٗ وَٰحِدَةٗۖ وَلَا يَزَالُونَ مُخۡتَلِفِينَ
translation: If your Lord had willed, He could have made mankind a single community, but they will not cease to differ[60],
footnotes: [60] They will ever be followers of different religions, ways of life and opinions.
